title: Kanon Kazahana
synopsis: The spring has come since Yuuichi reunited with Ayu, and lives of all major characters are back on track. When Mishio visits Makoto's birthplace, however, a miracle happens before her eyes.
characters: ['Tsukimiya, Ayu', 'Kawasumi, Mai', 'Sawatari, Makoto', 'Aizawa, Yuuichi', 'Minase, Nayuki', 'Misaka, Shiori', 'Kurata, Sayuri', 'Minase, Akiko', 'Misaka, Kaori', 'Amano, Mishio']
voices: ['Horie, Yui', 'Tamura, Yukari', 'Iizuka, Mayumi', 'Kisaichi, Atsushi', 'Kouda, Mariko', 'Sato, Akemi', 'Kawakami, Tomoko', 'Minaguchi, Yuko', 'Sakamoto, Maaya']
